English: Sixth day of fighting, Le Moule
Interesting that whenever shit hits the fan, they call for us. As if we are the only squad available...
Exactly! They even borrow soldiers from us, right Sergei?
While we're at it, be glad they didn't assign us to the attack on Levie, comrades.\nInstead we had two days off in Morton.
Levie was a fucking massacre, I heard. I had a friend who was a medic there.\nHe said he hasn't seen this much blood in a long time... Parts of limbs, internal organs splattered on the ground...
Stop that you idiot! I am sick already from the car, your bullshit does not help.
Being on the same squad does not mean I won't kick the shit out of you...
Enough comrades! If you don't stop, I will be the one kicking!\nStop pissing me off! We'll be there shortly.
KEEP FORMATION. WE SHALL LOOK AT THE END OF THIS ROAD. THEN WE'LL DECIDE WHERE TO NEXT.
LOOK AT IT. WHAT A MESS.
ANTON TO BAZA, WE FOUND A GUERILLA CAMP AT DB47 OR WHAT'S LEFT OF IT. IT SEEMS THEY WERE DISCOVERED, NOBODY SURVIVED. OVER.
BAZA TO ANTON, UNDERSTOOD. WE CAN'T DO MUCH ABOUT IT. CONTINUE WITH YOUR MISSION. BAZA OUT.
ANTON TO BAZA, WE ARE ENGAGING AMERICAN PATROL. NO SIGN OF BORIS YET, OUT.
THERE, IN THOSE TREES! LET'S HAVE A CLOSER LOOK.
THEY'RE ALL DEAD. WE'VE COME TOO LATE.
ANTON TO BAZA, PATROL BORIS IS DEAD. NO SURVIVORS. THIS PLACE IS CRAWLING WITH ENEMIES, WE RETREAT TOWARDS THE CAR, OVER.
UNDERSTOOD ANTON. RETREAT AS FAST AS YOU CAN. WE HAVE REPORTS OF ACTIVITY IN MONTIGNAC. WATCH OUT ON YOUR WAY BACK. BAZA OUT.
WATCH OUT! THEY'RE COMING FROM THE ROAD!
ANTON TO BAZA, OUR TRUCK IS OUT AND ENEMY IS APPROACHING. WE REQUEST A TRANSPORT, OVER.
UNDERSTOOD ANTON. TRANSPORT WAS SENT FOR. JOIN THEM AND RETREAT TOGETHER. BAZA OUT.
FOREST
RECCE THE AREA
JOIN WITH REINFORCEMENTS
